caption.p: Chemical structure of newly synthesized benzoic acid derivatives. R=: substituent group on the triazole; R1: phenyl R2: naphthaleneyl R3: sec-butyl R4: pentan-3-yl R5: cyclohexyl. NC-5: 4-(2, 2-Bis (hydroxymethyl)-5-oxopyrrolidin-l-yl)-3-(5-cyclohexyl-4H-1, 2, 4-triazol-3-yl)amino) benzoic acid.
